key_risks: Securities law investigation for potential violations
Regulatory scrutiny over drug pricing accuracy and claims processing

Data privacy and security risks due to reliance on digital health solutions
controversies: Investigation by Johnson Fistel, LLP, and Robbins LLP for securities law violations

Reduction in anesthesia coverage for Anthem members in New York and Connecticut
social_issues: Criticism from physicians and the public over policy changes
Efforts to reduce health disparities and improve health equity
governance_issues: Potential misrepresentation or failure to disclose material information to investors

sources.title: Elevance Health Inc (ELV) Under Investigation for Potential Secu
sources.snippet: On December 4, 2024, Johnson Fistel, LLP, a shareholder rights law firm, announced an investigation into Elevance Health Inc (ELV, Financial) to determine whether the company or its executive officers violated securities laws.The investigation is focused on whether Elevance Health misrepresented or failed to disclose material information to investors, potentially leading to financial losses.
